translation.de: Wenn ich sterbe, dann sag Mama, dass ich sie liebe.

translation.en: Over and out!
They poke the nest, they're gonna find hornets.
translation.de: Wenn sie im Nest stochern, finden sie Hornissen.

translation.en: Oh, okay, papi. They have fighter jets.
translation.de: Oh, okay, Kumpel. Sie haben Kampfjets.

translation.en: They have fighter jets, man.
Is this gonna work?
Well...
I hope so. [laughs] We better hurry.
translation.de: Das hoffe ich. Beeilen wir uns.

translation.en: Where'd you get these?
It's the pro shit. Ghost guns.
Ceramic barrels, plastic frames, plastic mags.
[Rovach] These are no longer my people. Through that crowd. Through that crowd!
translation.de: Das sind nicht mehr meine Leute. Durch die Menge.

translation.en: No, you evil fuck!
This is where you ask me if I'm afraid. Right now, I'm shit scared.
translation.de: Hier fragst du mich, ob ich Angst habe. Gerade habe ich eine Scheißangst.

translation.en: Dropping one! Two!
Three! Four!
Drive. Drive fast.
What's the status, Three?
I'm good. Just making the world a better place, that's all.
translation.de: Alles okay. Ich verbessere die Welt, das ist alles.

translation.en: Go! Go! Let's go!
[Seven] TOT, let's go, let's go, let's go!
Hey, Four, you've gotta sabotage that anchor.
translation.de: Vier, du musst den Anker sabotieren.

translation.en: See you on the other side.
Open the bridge.
All the way.
Don't start the party without me.
translation.de: Fangt die Party nicht ohne mich an.

translation.en: [One] Time clock. Guys.
Let's go. Go.
President. Ready to go underway.
[in Italian]
[in English] Hello.
Why are we not moving?
Cauliflower is very nice.
-I wanna move! -I told the captain to move.
translation.de: Ich will hier weg! Ich befahl dem Kapitän, abzulegen. Mehr geht nicht.

translation.en: -There's nothing more I can do. -I want to move right now!
translation.de: Ich befahl dem Kapitän, abzulegen. Mehr geht nicht. Ich will sofort weg.

translation.en: He's German. He's very precise.
Start the engines. Prepare to leave.
[Two] Side door is opening.
Take the wheel! Take the wheel!
Lock the boat down. Everyone, strap on body armor,
translation.de: Riegelt das Boot ab. Legt Schutzwesten an.

translation.en: and tell the captain let's get going.
[captain] Captain of the Kismet. I need military escort.
translation.de: Hier ist der Kapitän der Kismet. Ich brauche eine Eskorte.

translation.en: Not so fast. We're gonna stay and party. Get down.
translation.de: Nicht so schnell. Wir bleiben und feiern. Runter.

translation.en: Down. Get down. On your knees.
-All right. -Show me your hands, por favor.
Two hands!
[man, on radio] This is Turgistan security on the Kismet. Pirates have just--
translation.de: Hier ist der Wachdienst auf der Kismet. Piraten haben...

translation.en: [Four] Comms cut. We're good.
-Hey. -Hi.
Hey, papi.
Listen closely.
The enemy is us.
We must target him not where he is strong but where he's weak.
translation.de: Wir müssen ihn da treffen, wo er am schwächsten ist.

translation.en: Hospitals, to take away his safety.
translation.de: Krankenhäuser, um ihm die Sicherheit zu nehmen.

translation.en: Schools, to take away his future.
translation.de: Schulen, um ihm seine Zukunft zu nehmen.

translation.en: Youth, to suffocate his hope.
translation.de: Die Jugend, um seine Hoffnung zu ersticken.

translation.en: [Murat] Stop.
-[Rovach] Commence gas attack. -Get out of my way.
[Rovach] Do it now.
Do it!
I said do--
Join me, brothers.
So you don't have to kill your own people again.
translation.de: Damit ihr nicht mehr euer eigenes Volk töten müsst.

translation.en: Tell the military to back away from that boat.
translation.de: Das Militär soll sich vom Boot zurückziehen.

translation.en: Together, we will bring peace to our beloved country.
translation.de: Zusammen werden wir unserem geliebten Land Frieden bringen.

translation.en: We're good.
Guards have chest armor. Yes, they do.
translation.de: -Die Wachen haben Schutzwesten. -Ja, die haben sie.

translation.en: [Seven] We got the fancy composite Kevlar. I hope this works, man.
translation.de: Wir haben schicke Kevlarwesten. Ich hoffe, das klappt.

translation.en: -[One] It'll work. -They have some fancy food up there.
translation.de: -Das klappt. -Sie haben tolles Essen da oben.

translation.en: Really? Tell me more about that. Don't hold back.
This fish soup they call... labu... labuan...
translation.de: Diese Fischsuppe nennen sie... Labu... Labuan.

translation.en: I'm fucking kidding. Focus.
It's so delicious, man. They put this little cheese on it.
translation.de: Die ist so lecker. Sie legen da Käse drauf.

translation.en: Does it have to be on the walkie-talkie? And we're all standing right here. Yeah?
translation.de: Muss es im Walkie-Talkie sein? Wir stehen alle hier. Ja?

translation.en: Don't you give me attitude, okay? -Over and out. -[muttering] I...
Don't scratch my boat with your guns. It cost me one billion manat.
translation.de: Zerkratzt das Boot nicht mit den Waffen. Es hat 1 Milliarde Manat gekostet.

translation.en: [One, in English] When I pop this, the magnet pulse lasts for 15 seconds.
translation.de: Gut. Wenn ich hier drücke, dauert der Magnetpuls 15 Sekunden.

translation.en: Welcome to the world's biggest magnet.
I was thinking that when this is over, I want you to meet my mother, yes?
translation.de: Wenn das vorbei ist, triffst du meine Mutter, ja?

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, God. You didn't say that. What? Yes, I said it.
translation.de: -Oh Gott. Das hast du nicht gesagt. -Was? Ja, ich sagte das.

translation.en: What's wrong with you people?
Ooh! Big guns.
I found the back doors to Rovach's suite.
translation.de: Ich habe die Hintertür zu Rovachs Suite.

translation.en: Fuck!
[groans] Ah, fucking American-made!
The fucking chip fell out.
-What? -What?
-The chip fell out! -Well, fix it.
I can't just fix it, all right? The phone is very fucking complicated.
translation.de: Ich kann das nicht einfach reparieren. Das Handy ist kompliziert.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. No, no. Go. Go, go, go.
-Sir, please, we must leave right now. -Hungry. I went for a dip.
-I'm important guest. -We have to--
I just went for a dip, all right?
This is succulent chicken, man.
-Show me your hands. -This couscous?
Show me your hands!
Fine.
You know what?
I would love to meet your mother. Really?
I'm really happy.
-[police siren wails] -[Seven] Contact!
Come on.
-[One] What the fuck? -[Seven] One!
-What the fuck? -Put the phone down, and use your gun.
translation.de: -Verdammt. -Weg mit dem Handy. Fang an zu schießen.

translation.en: I got it, I got it! I got it!
-Grenade! -[loud drone]
Holy shit! I mean, I wasn't sure it would work.
translation.de: Heilige Scheiße! Ich war unsicher, ob's klappt.

translation.en: I mean, I wasn't "sure" sure. I had a suspicion, but I, uh...
translation.de: Ich war nicht ganz sicher. Ich vermutete es, aber...

translation.en: God, this is all so fucking dangerous.
Move!
Hey, hey!
You like that phone now, motherfucker?
This thing is amazing.
Stop fucking around. We gotta find Rovach.
translation.de: Lasst den Mist. Wir müssen Rovach finden.

translation.en: Oh, shit. What happened?
What the fuck?
[in English] Jesus. What did you do?
You goddamn animals.
Don't look at me. She's the evil one. -You did this? -Yeah.
translation.de: -Sieh mich nicht an. Sie ist die Böse. -Du warst das?

translation.en: -Why? -[Seven] If we don't move quick,
translation.de: Ja. Wieso? -Beeilung, bevor sie sie vom Boot holen. -Du bist krank.

translation.en: -they're gonna pull them from the boat. -You're sick.
translation.de: -Beeilung, bevor sie sie vom Boot holen. -Du bist krank.

translation.en: Disgusting.
[One] Let's find Rovach.
[Seven] Let's go.
More guys coming.
[Seven] Flashbang!
[man] Move it here!
[man] Move, move.
-The boat's moving. -That's bad.
-Mag! -[automatic gunfire]
-Magnet! Where is the magnet? -[Seven] They're getting their guns!
translation.de: -Magnet! Wo ist der Magnet? -Sie holen ihre Waffen!

translation.en: -Fix the phone! -I'm trying!
The screen is cracked!
We get it! They're dead!
Shit. They got our position. We need to move.
translation.de: Scheiße. Die wissen, wo wir sind. Wir müssen weiter.

translation.en: Honestly, I didn't think we'd make it this far.
translation.de: Ehrlich, ich dachte nicht, dass wir so weit kommen.

translation.en: Go kill the engine.
translation.de: Geh und stell den Motor ab.

translation.en: [One] That is disgusting!
It was a flashbang.
Holy shit.
We should split up.
Go with him.
Get me to the boat.
-You. Where's Rovach? -[clattering]
I feel like a Jedi.
Five, flush him out.
[Four] Five, find Rovach. I'll distract the guards.
translation.de: Fünf, finde Rovach. Ich lenke die Wachen ab.

translation.en: I wouldn't do that.
[man] We're sinking.
I've got four guys on me. I'm on the upper deck, and I'm screwed.
translation.de: Vier Kerle sind auf dem Oberdeck hinter mir her. Sie haben mich.

translation.en: [One] No, no, no!
Come on!
Oh, no.Wait. Wait. I got it.
translation.de: Oh, nein. Warte. Ich habe was.

translation.en: Big motherfucker.
-[both exclaim] -I almost shot you right in the head. Goddamn it. You go eat some food.
translation.de: -Fast hätte ich dich erschossen. -Verdammt. Hol dir noch was zu essen.

translation.en: -Fuck you. -Fuck you.
No, you fuck you.
-[Two] I'm in Rovach's stateroom. -[Rovach speaking Turkmen]
-[in English] Get me to the rescue boat. -One.
Rovach is leaving with a guard.
translation.de: Eins. Rovach geht mit einer Wache.

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
Four, where you at?
[Four] One, please!
-Four? -[Four] Help me!
Give me a hint, buddy.
Get me out of this boat.
What's your 20? Anybody got eyes on the target?
I don't know my 20. Stay off the channel. I'm going for Four.
translation.de: -Ich kenne sie nicht. Bleib vom Kanal. -Ich suche Vier.

translation.en: -Four, where you at, buddy? -[Seven] You're breaking your own rules.
translation.de: -Wo bist du? -Du brichst deine eigenen Regeln.

translation.en: I thought you didn't have a family.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du hast keine Familie.

translation.en: Fuck, fuck, fuck!
It's a big ship. Say something, pal.
translation.de: Das Schiff ist groß. Sag was, Kumpel.

translation.en: He's gonna kill me.
Look, Bond, you gotta get here fast.
There you are.
What?
It's a TV show. Come on, let's go. Fucking millennials.
translation.de: Aus einer TV-Show. Gehen wir. Verdammte Millennials.

translation.en: Ship's sinking. Come on.
They're all in.
As fast as she can fly to the villa in Dezar.
translation.de: Fliegt so schnell wie möglich zur Villa in Dezar.

translation.en: They sunk my boat.
I was thinking of somewhere else.
translation.de: Ich dachte an ein anderes Ziel.

translation.en: -Hey. -I'll blow your fucking head off!
Who are you?
[One] No one.
[reporter1] In Turgistan, we're witnessing a regime change.
translation.de: In Turgistan beobachten wir einen Regimewechsel.

translation.en: [reporter 2] We're following a major breaking story. [reporter 3] Country's overthrown...
translation.de: -Wir berichten mit einer Eilmeldung. -Das Regime wurde gestürzt...

translation.en: [reporter 4] Countries around the world are now mobilizing to give them help.
translation.de: Länder auf der ganzen Welt bereiten Hilfe vor.

translation.en: Refugee camps are emptying. It's an amazing sight to see.
translation.de: Die Flüchtlingslager leeren sich. Ein toller Anblick.

translation.en: [reporter 5] We're following a major breaking story.
[reporter 4] We understand now that they're dropping Rovach off to rebels.
translation.de: Soweit wir wissen, wird Rovach an die Rebellen übergeben.

translation.en: [Rovach] I know you.
From the opera, right?
-Welcome to Act Five. -I knew it.
What are you gonna do?
I'm your brother!
You didn't listen to me, Brother.
translation.de: Du hast nicht auf mich gehört, Bruder.

translation.en: Kill me here, huh? I wanna die with dignity.
translation.de: Töte mich hier, ja? Ich will in Würde sterben.

translation.en: Kill me here.
Kill me here!
Kill me!
Kill me right now.
Don't let them touch me. Shoot me right now!
translation.de: Sie sollen mich nicht anrühren. Erschieß mich!

translation.en: No! No!
[One] Truth?
I have no idea what happens when you die.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was passiert, wenn man stirbt.

translation.en: Death's still a mystery.
But life...
a little less so.
Alone...
we walk the Earth...
quiet.
But together?
As a team?
Oh, we can do some shit...
awfully loud.
They say that your soul departs when you pass.
translation.de: Man sagt, die Seele geht beim Tod.

translation.en: Well, for us, it was the opposite.
translation.de: Für uns war es das Gegenteil.

translation.en: The moment nothing to lose...
translation.de: Der Moment, in dem nichts zu verlieren...

translation.en: became something to gain.
And the whole wide world...
seemed a little less haunted.
I am one... but not done.
translation.de: Ich bin einer, der noch nicht fertig ist.

translation.en: Next time, can we just knock off a fucking casino?
translation.de: Können wir das nächste Mal einfach ein Kasino ausrauben?
